name: Boss Battle Incoming
description:
The forces of good are attacking the castle of the demon overlord!

Protect the castle until the overlord arrives by getting powerups and summoning dragons and throwing them over the edge of the castle. 

Move with WASD or arrows , and use Space to interact. Gamepad is not recommended, "it works" but not correctly, it will be fixed.

It's been developed in around 40 hours for VimJam2. The game lacks some things that I wanted to make (even the page for the game is lacking), but I didn't have enough time to add it all, it doesn't even have sound effects for the actions, but I will update it little by little after the jam. Oh, and sorry Vim, it doesn't work well in fullscreen so it's disabled for now.
